title: NewsBreak: Oil Jumps 3% on Upbeat Chinese Data
text:
NewsBreak: Oil Jumps 3% on Upbeat Chinese Data

Commodities 9 hours ago (Sep 04, 2019 15:46)

© Reuters. Investing.com - Oil prices spiked higher on Wednesday, boosted by positive news from China’s services sector. • China’s services sector expanded by the fastest pace in three months in August, driven by new orders. China is the world’s second-largest oil consumer. • West Texas for December surged 3.3% to $55.72 a barrel as of 10:27 AM ET (14:27 GMT). • futures, the benchmark for oil prices outside the U.S., rose 3.1% to $60.08 a barrel.

NewsBreak: Oil Jumps 3% on Upbeat Chinese Data
description: NewsBreak: Oil Jumps 3% on Upbeat Chinese Data
